title: Eames Style Soft Pad Office Chair EA215 Black
body: The Soft Pad Group design of Charles Eames in 1969 comprises of a variety of chairs which are suited for use in offices, public spaces and home. Eames Soft Pad Office Chair EA215 is an ideal choice for relaxed lounge seating. With their high backrest and soft upholstery, this chair remains comfortable even after for prolonged sitting periods. Idyllic for continuous use and suitable for high-end task or meeting chair. The chairs adapt to the body of the sitter and provide extraordinary comfort.
